# Summary

Here is a graph of `r params$yvar` against `r params$xvar`, grouped by `r params$groupvar`.

```{r}
#| label: lib-load
#| echo: FALSE
#| include: FALSE

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| label: data-intro
#| echo: FALSE
#| include: TRUE

data <- get(params$data)

data %>% 
  ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes_string(x=params$xvar, y=params$yvar, colour=params$groupvar))
```
